mapper.select: select document_id from study_document where file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from study_document order by document_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into study_document (document_id, document_title, document_introduction, cover_img, file_path, user_id, createtime, updatetime) values (#{documentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{documentTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{documentIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())

update study_document
document_title = #{documentTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
document_introduction = #{documentIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cover_img = #{coverImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where document_id = #{documentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update study_document set document_title = #{documentTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, document_introduction = #{documentIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover_img = #{coverImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = now() where document_id = #{documentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
